issue.title: [CF 1522] bar textures
issue.body:
I am unable to change the bar texture from the default, not sure even which one that it is initially. I know that this is a picky thing, but some folks are just that particular.

 

Thanks in advance

 


> Posted by CurseForge user txamethyst | Imported from CurseForge issue #1522 | Raw

comments.body:
The setting is working just fine for me. If your issue persists, please post more detailed information about what happens when you change the bar texture setting - any errors you're getting, screenshots, etc. 


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
